sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that
\[
	\frac{a }{y - z } = \frac{b }{z - x } = \frac{c }{x - y }
\]
Then prove that
\[
	xa + yb + zc = 0
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 
It is given that
\[
	\frac{a }{y - z } = \frac{b }{z - x } = \frac{c }{x - y } = k \textrm{ (assume)}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow a = k (y - z ) 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow b = k (z - x )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow c = k (x - y )
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, lets consider the given expression
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = xa + yb + zc 
\]
\[
	= xk (y - z ) + yk (z - x ) + zk (x - y )
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	= k \left[x (y - z ) + y (z - x ) + z (x - y )\right]
\]
\[
	= k \left[xy - xz + yz - xy + xz - yz \right]
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	= k (0)
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": " 
\[
	= 0 = \textrm{ RHS}
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Assuming $\frac{a }{y - z } = \frac{b }{z - x } = \frac{c }{x - y } = k$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Taking term $a$ separately, we get $ a = k (y - z ) $}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Similarly, taking terms $ b $ and $ c $ separately, we get $b = k (z - x )$ and $c = k (x - y )$} "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Taking expression $ xa + yb + zc $, and substituting for the value of $a$, $b$, and $c$, we get LHS $=xk (y - z ) + yk (z - x ) + zk (x - y )$}"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Taking $k$ as common and opening the portion inside the bracket we get k \left[xy - xz + yz - xy + xz - yz \right]}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplification previous expression, we get $k (0)$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
